General.Name: CJ Korea Express
General.Description: CJ Logistics Corporation provides integrated transportation and logistics services for individuals and companies in Korea and internationally. It engages in contract logistics, parcel, forwarding and international express, stevedoring and transportation, project logistics businesses. CJ Logistics Corporation was formerly known as Korea Express Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1930 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. CJ Logistics Corporation operates as a subsidiary of CJ Corporation.
General.Address: CJ Logistics Building, Seoul, South Korea, 04513
